snippet.title: Is College as Debauched as Tom Wolfe Thinks?
snippet.description:
College WeekNov 15, 2005Is College as Debauched as Tom Wolfe Thinks?
This morning I had aerobic dance class at 8 a.m. It's the first 8:00 class I've had in college, and I brought it on myself....
By Laurel Wamsley
